EmailJS Service ID: Make an EmailJS Service and paste its ID (Gmail service)
EmailJS Template ID: Make an EmailJS Template and paste its ID (How do you want the email sent to look like?)
*IMPORTANT*: You can delete this key-value pair. But the template in EmailJS recieves certain variables from REACT. See 'src/components/ContactForm.js' to see what params are being sent and make templates accordingly.
